The player with the highest triple value starts.
If no one has a triple, the player with the highest score starts. Tap on this player before tapping on the triple or entering the number of points.

The starting point is the sum of the tile value and the starting bonus.

about.title: About Tridom Points
about.description: Tridom Points is an application that helps you to count the points in the game Super Tridom / Triominos. The app is free, ad-free and does not collect any personal data. I wrote this app in my spare time and appreciate any positive feedback. If you have any questions or suggestions, please email me at tridompoints@relaxmaus.de. Have fun playing!
